verbose_text: Interestingly, distinct Rab family members have also been recently shown to be phosphorylated by the mitochondrial membrane protein kinase termed PTEN induced putative kinase 1 (PINK1), which is itself also implicated in Parkinson 's disease [XREF_BIBR].
evidence: Rab family members have also been recently shown to be phosphorylated by the mitochondrial membrane protein kinase termed PTEN
